name: Pony Girls Magic Friendship
description:
===== BEST PONY DRESS UP GAME =====

If You love Pony girls. She'll back!! Everyone loves dress up games.. But they get boring. This is not your usual dress up game.

Pony girls dress-up and salon with high fashion dresses!
The combinations allow for seemingly endless fun!

Features:
- 8 Pony Girls
- 14 Magic stuff
- 15 Dresses
- 20 Hair
- 15 symbol
- 19 pants
- 6 backgrounds settings
- that's over 4,500,000 combinations!
- Hours of entertainment

Start Creating Your Cute Pony Today, Download Now!
